question: What is the name of the application that has been launched by the Indian Air Force, for its aspirants?
explanation:
The Indian Air Force has launched a new mobile application called “My IAF”. It is developed as a part of Digital India Initiative and is introduced by Air Chief Marshal Rakesh Kumar Singh Bhadauria, Chief of the Air Staff.
The app is developed by the Indian Air Force in association with the Centre for Development of Advanced Computing (C-DAC). It aims to provide career-related information and guidance to aspirants who wish to join IAF.
